Class CentralCabin

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.ComponentTile
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.CentralCabin
Direct Known Subclasses:
CabinModule
public class CentralCabin extends ComponentTile
This class represents a Central Cabin component tile. Central Cabins can hold crew members (only humans) up to a maximum capacity.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Giacomo Amaducci

    Constructs a new Central Cabin with the specified edges.

  • Constructor Details

    • CentralCabin

      public CentralCabin(List<TileEdge> edges, String graphicPath)
      Constructs a new Central Cabin with the specified edges. Initializes an empty crewmates list.
      Parameters:
      edges - the list of edges defining the tile connections

  • Method Details

    • getCrewmates

      public List<Crewmate> getCrewmates()
      Returns the list of crewmates currently in this cabin.
      Returns:
      the List<Crewmate> containing all crewmates in this cabin

    • addCrewmate

      public void addCrewmate(Human human) throws InvalidActionException
      Adds a new Human object to the List<Crewmate> of the cabin. The cabin can hold a maximum of 2 crewmates. Humans cannot be added to a cabin that contains an Alien.
      Parameters:
      human - the human to be added to the cabin
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the cabin is already full (contains 2 crewmates) or if the cabin contains an Alien

    • removeCrewmate

      public Crewmate removeCrewmate() throws InvalidActionException
      Removes a Crewmate from the List<Crewmate> of the cabin. For simplicity, the first element of the List<Crewmate> is removed.
      Returns:
      the Crewmate that was removed from the cabin
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the cabin is empty
